CustomField.description: This field is required for this record. It is automatically populated by the layout builder via trigger, but can also be manually populated. This field is used to generate the apperance and data in the screen section via HTML and Knockout binders.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Edit the contents of this field using the WSYIWYG editor built into the Screen View object page. Do not cut-and-paste text into this field from another editor. Do not copy text from the read-only view of the page into the edit view.
CustomField.label: Read Only
